title: Artists residency and exhibition in Myymälä2 Helsinki
description: From June 30th to July 16th, Dare to Care Art Collective invites you to an exhibition with workshops and performances about physicality of emotions and bodily experiencing.
linktext: Please visit Myymälä2 webpage for further information.
details: The international art collective Dare to Care is coming to Helsinki with an unreleased exhibition about mental health and the Arts, accompanied by workshops and performances. During a week-long residency at Myymälä2Gallery artists Miriam Poletti, Ania Duldiier and Cami Ruohonen will investigate the complex relationship between emotions, body and nature.

title: Instagram Takeover x Mental Health Europe
description: Mental Health Europe, Europe's number one mental health NGO, offered us its social media platform to present our work and the artists in our collective.
linktext: Please visit Mental Health Europe on Instagram to see all the posts.
details: Mental Health Europe, Europe's number one mental health NGO, offered us its social media platform to present our work and the artists in our collective.
